about_the_game:
Please, close your eyes and imagine an apple.

Can you see it? Can you feel it?

If you can, you should take a bite.

One day, Julio wakes up in the Labyrinth Beyond Time and Space having forgotten his past. With the help of his boyfriend, Amador, they must embark on a quest to recover his memories stolen by the witch Mnemosyne and his nine muses.

Will they recover his memories and escape the labyrinth?
In the process, will they fall in love all over again?

Aim your way to victory, use the power of the elements to your advantage and discover the meaning of love, oranges and what tomorrow holds in this fun RPG!

  • A unique take on progression, where in each area you must figure out a strategy from random equipment you scavenge. It's like a combo between a rogue-like and a randomizer.

  • A fun (and maybe heartfelt) story with a few twists and turns!

  • Many mementos to customize your trek through the labyrinth: Arts to use in battle, attack modifiers and strange passive effects!

  • 9+ different areas, bosses and many secrets ready for you!

  • If you're reading this far in, I'm sure you'll find much more to enjoy!
detailed_description:
Please, close your eyes and imagine an apple.

Can you see it? Can you feel it?

If you can, you should take a bite.

One day, Julio wakes up in the Labyrinth Beyond Time and Space having forgotten his past. With the help of his boyfriend, Amador, they must embark on a quest to recover his memories stolen by the witch Mnemosyne and his nine muses.

Will they recover his memories and escape the labyrinth?
In the process, will they fall in love all over again?

Aim your way to victory, use the power of the elements to your advantage and discover the meaning of love, oranges and what tomorrow holds in this fun RPG!

  • A unique take on progression, where in each area you must figure out a strategy from random equipment you scavenge. It's like a combo between a rogue-like and a randomizer.

  • A fun (and maybe heartfelt) story with a few twists and turns!

  • Many mementos to customize your trek through the labyrinth: Arts to use in battle, attack modifiers and strange passive effects!

  • 9+ different areas, bosses and many secrets ready for you!

  • If you're reading this far in, I'm sure you'll find much more to enjoy!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux version 2016+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300 or Raspberry Pi 4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux version 2020+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or Raspberry Pi 5 with overclocking
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core 2 Duo SU9400
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i5-8500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: The Orange of Tomorrow

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: The Orange of Tomorrow is a turn-based RPG where you must aim your attacks. Use the power of fate and the elements to discover the meaning of love, oranges and what tomorrow holds.
